Content.Text:
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome, welcome. Is this the first time you've
paid me a visit?
<PAGE>
My name is <BLUE>Mistel</BLUE>, and I have the proud
distinction of being the proprietor of the town's
antique shop.
<PAGE>
You are <MYNAME>, right? Ah, and what a face
to go with such a splendid name. It's my
pleasure to meet you.
<PAGE>
Feel free to talk to me at the counter during
business hours. I'd be glad to show you any of
my wares.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>. Welcome to my antique shop.
<PAGE>
I have some wonderful pieces you simply MUST
check out.
<PAGE>
Feel free to talk to me at the counter during
business hours. I'd be glad to show you any of
my wares.
